sections.heading: Limitations of obligations to a bank; exceptions; definitions6-352
sections.text: Limitations of obligations to a bank; exceptions; definitionsA. A bank may lend to a single borrower an amount equal to not more than twenty percent of its capital, plus an amount equal to an additional ten percent of its capital if
